channel.title: Shooting robots on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in Shooting robots on Game6r

item.title: Robo Battle
item.description: So, before you is a very exciting and dynamic game Robot killer. You will have to kill other robots, very diverse in design. All of them will try in one way or another to destroy your character. At first, he only has two rapid-fire cannons. However, among the debris that remains from the enemies, you can find additional weapons and insert them into free slots. Instead of weapons, money drops out more often.
